hero.title: Hi, I'm Charles!
hero.p0: Full stack wizard, student, and entrepreneur
hero.des0: I'm a 2nd year computer science and business student at the University of Waterloo.
hero.des1: I love collaborating in teams to create high-quality and sophisticated software.
hero.des2: My preferred tech stack involves React, NodeJS, and GraphQL.
hero.des3: I'm currently building my own SASS startup, offerring virtual study spaces for students.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my favourite projects I've lead and developed. Not only were they super fun to code, but many of them are providing utilty to real people today!

msmr.subtitle: Contracted by Ryerson University
msmr.description: Blog and research sharing web app under the MSMR brand belonging to Dr. Jenny Liu

hitea.subtitle: Global Bubble Tea Chain
hitea.description: Landing page for an estblished brand with over 163 branches globally.

productify.subtitle: Virtual Study Space Platform
productify.description: Currently in progress! This web app leverages social interaction and gamification to promote effective studying by individuals and groups.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Though I'm always excited to use the latest and greatest technologies, these are my tried and tested go to tools when building any project.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: These companies had the honour of having me on their team. Hopefully your company will be there too.

contact.title: Want to connect?
contact.description: I really appreciate it when people go out of their way to get in touch. I'll make sure to get back to you as soon as possible!

footer: Crafted with NextJS, TailwindCSS, and Lots of ❤️
